availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Cullen (Jefferson County, KY, flour dealer & grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, grocer and flour dealer. Married Ellen Croack Cullen in Jefferson County on January 8, 1855. Retail grocer in Louisville in 1859. Grocer in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859-60 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1859), 59.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1860-61 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1861), 66.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482708, p. 15 of microfilm.
